descriptionHtml:
Description
------------
16 new Standalone eyes (you do not need to be a vampire).

optional files
------------
Re-placer just replaces the default vampire eyes with the yellow eye texture. If you want a different colour you can just rename the colour you want from the standalone version and move to character eyes folder.

Plans
------------
Add more colours.
Make available to all races.
Make Glowing versions.
Give unique eye colours to Volkihar npcs.

Edit
------------
Lost all my files so doubt ill be completing this. Thanks to all who endorsed I appreciate it.

Installation
------------
Simply place the data folder into your Skyrim folder and then activate the esp

Permission instructions
------------
You may not redistribute this mod in any way or claim it as your own.
Um anything else just ask me.
author: Efnysien
